summary: So y'know how both the crit role cast and fandom like to joke about how Taliesin is secretly a fae trickster or an immortal...
body:
So y'know how both the crit role cast and fandom like to joke about how Taliesin is secretly a fae trickster or an immortal eldritch being of unspeakable power?

Well, fun fact: There is a 1500 year old Welsh myth that describes a boy who ingested a witches brew and was then eaten by said witch, only to be reborn as an omniscient, beautiful, shapeshifting bard named Taliesin

Do with that what you will

body:
Spoilers for critical role season 2 episode 26

Wasn’t the original purpose of the black dodechedron to capture drow souls and put them into younger bodies as a direct rencarnation. Molly’s soul is currently vacant from his body.

How the fuck is that gonna play out?

summary: I have so much love and empathy for Caleb being so self-doubting, so self-hating, so utterly convinced that he is stupid and...
body: I have so much love and empathy for Caleb being so self-doubting, so self-hating, so utterly convinced that he is stupid and evil and will always just ruin everything he touches. It’s a mindset I am all too familiar with myself, and seeing Caleb finding it within him to trust and form bonds despite all this is so, so important and precious to me.

reblog.comment: I have so much love and empathy for Caleb being so self-doubting, so self-hating, so utterly convinced that he is stupid and evil and will always just ruin everything he touches. summary: Spoilers for season 2 of Critical Role... you should all know what it's about at this point
body:
Spoilers for season 2 of Critical Role… you should all know what it’s about at this point

So a lot of people are saying that Mollymauk could comeback as a Lingering Soul, and that is very cool for a lot of reasons.

First, we get more Molly. Two, Taliesin is happy again. Third, we get to see a whole new class at work.

But a lot of people are misunderstanding a certain aspect of Lingering Soul: why you are still on earth is very important.

We would all like to think that if Molly comes back as a Lingering Soul, he’ll come back as a Spirit Guardian, but let’s be real, Molly will not stay for a group of misfits he met about 1 month ago; no, he would com back as either a Poltergeist or a Wraith.

Molly would either be full of rage against Lorenzo (Poltergeist) or think that he died to soon and wants to stay, he never wanted to die so quickly (Wraith). So that would mean something else: his actions would mostly be because of those feeling, he won’t be the same Molly that we knew before.

Molly will probably be more emotional and more volatile than before, and maybe even always be one misplaced word away from a fit of rage… and I so want that. I wanna see a truly angry Mollymauk, I wanna see him lash out with true anger at Beau, I wanna see him apologize for feeling so angry and not knowing how to stop, I wanna see him almost angry sob because he does not understand his emotions. Maybe he starts to agresivly flirt with Caleb and he flips out when Caleb tries to peace out cause he is uncomfortable.

It would make for such great RP. I really don’t want him to come out as a goodie toochoose. Taliesin deserves to explore his acting and not just be a healer, but an angry emotional ghost.

tags: look I just have a lot of feelings about these two
headcanon: sometimes Nott makes a point of being the one in charge of splitting the things they share
it's an open secret that she does it to give Caleb more than she gets
she pretends not to know where it comes from when he sneaks things back
summary: Noticing (Nott & Caleb) Nobody prompted me for a drabble (yet), so I just gave myself some extra Critical Role feels instead....
body:
Noticing (Nott & Caleb)

Nobody prompted me for a drabble (yet), so I just gave myself some extra Critical Role feels instead.

Sometimes, with the robes draping around him, Nott doesn’t notice how thin Caleb is. On cold nights like this one, when they curl up together and she can feel the boniness of his ribs, hear the faint growls in his stomach as he sleeps, she does. He wasn’t as quick as usual at dinner tonight, didn’t manage to hide it from her as he split their one small loaf into two equal pieces like he isn’t twice her size. Moving carefully, she slips the last of her jerky into Caleb’s bag, hoping maybe he’ll be just as bad at noticing.

summary: I am usually not very adamant about headcanons, but you can pry ace!Nott and nb!Molly from my cold, dead hands.
